content: found here is the clothing removable how does it go on over the dolls head all of the items in my doll clothing patterns are removable the clothing items are designed to go on over their feet special stitches invisible single_crochet decrease please read - as this way of decreasing should be used throughout the pattern decrease insert hook in front loop only of first st insert hook in front loop only of second st 3 lps on hook yo and draw through 2 lps yo and complete single_crochet as normal please see this youtube video for a demonstration of this type of decrease useful from 1min 48 in 3hdc bobble 1 yo insert hook into st and draw up a loop 3 loops on hook 2 yo insert hook into st and draw up a loop 5 loops on hook 3 yo insert hook into st and draw up a loop 7 loops on hook 4 yo and pull through all 7 loops on hook pattern start hands and arms make 2 crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from hand to shoulder use a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st from now on work 6sc 6sts round 2 work 2sc in each st around 12sts round 3 single_crochet in each st around 12sts round 4 work a 3hdc bobble see special stitches in the first st makes thumb single_crochet in each of the remaining 11sts 12sts round 5 single_crochet in each st around 12sts round 6 *single_crochet in each of the first 4sts decrease repeat from * once more 10sts round 7 decrease single_crochet in each of the remaining 8sts 9sts round 8 - 10 single_crochet in each st around 9sts ~ 6 ~ stuff hand firmly and the arm lighter and lighter towards the top there should be very little stuffing in the top of the arm be careful not to overstuff the arm it should be tapered from the side and sit nicely at the side of the body when attached see photo on first page you may have difficulty getting the clothing on and fit correctly if they are overstuffed round 11 single_crochet in the first st decrease *single_crochet in the next st decrease repeat from * around 6sts slip_stitch across until the loop on your hook is at the side of the arm as pictured now holding the arm so that the working loop on the hook is on the right pinch the top of the arm together you will have 3sts on either side the front and back ch1 not a st and single_crochet in each st across working through all 4 loops at the front and back of the work to close the top of the arm 3sts fasten_off and hide loose ends you will crochet the arms onto the body on round 26 of the body legs make 2 each leg is crocheted in continuous spirals
